name: Album/EP mix bundle (pricing deals from £100)
description: PAYMENT: Please pay via PayPal (PayPal also lets you pay by card.) If you are paying in another currency the amount will be automatically converted upon checkout. To check prices simply use an online currency converter (google has one.) We offer various mixing bundles, aimed at larger mixing jobs, specifically artists who have a whole EP or album they need mixing. Turnaround is usually 7-14 days, depending on the length of the project. We will email you if we expect this to be longer (in most cases it won't be.) INSTRUCTIONS (PLEASE READ!!) SHIPPING: Please select 'United Kingdom' if you wish your track(s) to be sent digitally to you. They will be emailed to you in uncompressed .WAV & 328 kbps MP3 format. If you would like a burned audio CD of your track(s) posted to you, please select the 'Everywhere Else' option. There is a flat rate shipping fee of £3.00 PRICING:

name: Album/EP master bundles (pricing deals from £60)
description: PAYMENT: Please pay via PayPal (PayPal also lets you pay by card.) If you are paying in another currency the amount will be automatically converted upon checkout. To check prices simply use an online currency converter (google has one.) We offer various mastering bundles, aimed at larger mastering jobs, specifically for artists who have a whole EP or album they need mastered. Turnaround is usually 7 days, depending on the length of the project. We will email you if we expect this to be longer (in most cases it won't be.) INSTRUCTIONS (PLEASE READ!!) SHIPPING: Please select 'United Kingdom' if you wish your track(s) to be sent digitally to you. They will be emailed to you in uncompressed .WAV & 328 kbps MP3 format. If you would like a burned audio CD of your track(s) posted to you, please select the 'Everywhere Else' option. There is a flat rate shipping fee of £3.00 PRICING:

name: 1 track mix (£30, $47)
description: PAYMENT: Payments via PayPal (PayPal also lets you pay by card.) If you're paying in another currency the amount will be automatically converted upon checkout. To check prices simply use an online currency converter (google has one.) This is our base mixing price, which covers tracks under 10 minutes and 20 stems (tracks within the song) or less. We have a full pricing list available here. If you require any extras please order a standard mix and leave a message through PayPal/email stating what you want, and we'll invoice you the extra cost. Turnaround is usually 1-2 days, we'll email you if we expect this to be longer (in most cases it won't be.) INSTRUCTIONS (PLEASE READ!!) SHIPPING: Please select 'United Kingdom' if you wish your track(s) to be sent digitally to you. They will be emailed to you in uncompressed .WAV & 328 kbps MP3 format. If you'd like a burned audio CD of your track(s) posted to you, please select the 'Everywhere Else' option. Shipping is £3.00

options.name: standard rate (20 stems, track under 10 minutes long)
track over 10 minutes long? choose this option

name: 1 track master (£20, $31)
description: PAYMENT: Please pay via PayPal (PayPal also lets you pay by card.) If you are paying in another currency the amount will be automatically converted upon checkout. To check prices simply use an online currency converter (google has one.) For £20 ($31 US dollars) you will receive a professional standard master of your song of any genre. Song length may be up to 10 minutes, if your track is longer than that please select the 'track longer than 10 minutes' option. Turnaround is usually 1-2 days, we will email you if we expect this to be longer (in most cases it won't be.) INSTRUCTIONS (PLEASE READ!!) SHIPPING: Please select 'United Kingdom' if you wish your track(s) to be sent digitally to you. They will be emailed to you in uncompressed .WAV & 328 kbps MP3 format. If you would like a burned audio CD of your track(s) posted to you, please select the 'Everywhere Else' option. There is a flat rate shipping fee of £3.00

name: Beat mixing (instrumental + acapellas) £20, $32
description: PAYMENT: Payments via PayPal (PayPal also lets you pay by card.) If you're paying in another currency the amount will be automatically converted upon checkout. To check prices use an online currency converter (google has one.) This is our base price for beat mixing. This covers songs under 10 mins and 15 stems (tracks within the song) or less. If you require any extras please see our full pricing list here. To order extras simply order a standard mix and let us know via PayPal/email of any extras you want and we'll invoice you the extra costs. Turnaround is 1-2 days, we'll email you if we expect it to be longer. INSTRUCTIONS (PLEASE READ!!) NOTE:Your instrumental track may be a stereo file, but please ensure any acapella tracks are MONO. SHIPPING: Please select 'United Kingdom' if you wish your track(s) to be sent digitally to you. They'll be emailed to you in uncompressed .WAV & 328 kbps MP3 format. To have a burned audio CD of your track(s) posted to you, please select the 'Everywhere Else' option. Shipping is £3.00
